name: Agent Silhouette (PSI Games, Garlock009, casscadence)
description:
A stealth-based platformer with no combat and a compelling art style, Agent Silhouette sets you deep underground in a faraway jungle, where hides an expansive complex dedicated to the heinous plans of an evil mad scientist. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to infiltrate the facility, using your graceful agility and expert stealth tactics to navigate the area and avoid its hostile inhabitants. Reach your objective without being seen, thwart the villain’s master plan, and save the world! 

[This is a demo and not representative of the game as it will be in its final state! That being said, enjoy! All feedback is welcome!]

Install instructions

Simply extract the .exe and data folder from the .zip and place both in one location. Afterwards, run the .exe and enjoy the game! 

Follow our Progress!

Get updates as we develop this demo into a full game by checking out our Twitter and by subscribing to our newsletter!
